ygData.subject: RE: Thanks for all the input (was New bard questions)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Kelethin is the only place that the Lament song is sold. (I started at Qeynos to go get it) ... Imagine what is used to be like, when there was only one
ygData.messageBody:
>First I'll concentrate on getting level 8 (I'm halfway there now), then
>I'll head over to either Queynos or Kelethin (from Freeport) to get the
>Kelin's Lament song. I've travelled to Kelethin many times to sell

Kelethin is the only place that the Lament song is sold.
(I started at Qeynos to go get it)

>small patchwork. It's a pretty easy, but very boring, trip. That boat
>trip is a killer. First wait up to 20 minutes for the boat, then

Imagine what is used to be like, when there was only one boat?
This boat trip is a BREEZE to me, because I started when it was
SO much worse.

>another 20 riding the boat. What fun. With Selo's is travelling to
>Queynos a better or worse plan? I have maps, but I've never actually

With Selo's, traveling to Qeynos is easy. I did the trip Qeynos to
Rivervale/Freeport three time when I died on my way back from Kelethin...

Thankfully, the third time a guildmate took pity and tp'd me to NK.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 8 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
(Blackburrow)
